items.name: Coward's Legacy
explicitMods: 50% increased Effect of Curses on you
You count as on Low Life while you are Cursed with Vulnerability
flavourText: Death is your most important duty.
Face it, or curse your bloodline for all eternity.

items.name: Rapture Grip
implicitMods: Inflict Cold Exposure on Hit, applying -11% to Cold Resistance
15% chance to Unnerve Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit
explicitMods: 41% increased Damage with Hits against Chilled Enemies
craftedMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Projectile Gems

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that can chill enemies or create chilling areas.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 20% increased Chill Duration on Enemies
44% increased Effect of Chill inflicted with Supported Skills
Enemies Chilled by Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect
Enemies in Chilling Areas from Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect
Supported Skills deal 14% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a sudden burst of cold in a targeted area, damaging enemies. This also creates an expanding area which is filled with chilled ground, and deals cold damage over time to enemies. Enemies that die while in the area have a chance to grant Frenzy Charges. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Frenzy Charge.
explicitMods: Deals 1895.4 Base Cold Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when an Enemy Dies while in this Skill's Area
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies or inflicts ailments
explicitMods: 64% increased Duration of Ailments inflicted with Supported Skills
Supported Skills have 54% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments on Enemies
Supported Skills deal 19% more Damage with Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Heatshiver
enchantMods: Ice Spear fires an additional Projectile
explicitMods: Gain 1% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1% Chill Effect on Enemy
Gain 100% of Cold Damage as Extra Fire Damage against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Give of your heated passions.
Give of your cold resolve.
You will be repaid.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Spends a portion of your mana to grant a buff that takes some of the damage from hits for you until depleted. The buff grants added lightning damage based on the amount of mana spent by this skill. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods:
75% of Damage from Hits is taken from Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
Buff grants Added Lightning Damage equal to 14% of Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a crystal that pulses with cold for a duration. Each pulse applies a debuff to nearby enemies for a secondary duration which reduces life and energy shield regeneration rate, and also inflicts Cold Exposure. When the crystal's duration ends, it explodes, dealing heavy cold damage to enemies around it.
explicitMods: 4% more Damage with Hits per 0.1 seconds Duration
Cold Exposure applies -15% to Cold Resistance
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a portal to the current area's town.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will be triggered when you die. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
100% chance to Trigger Supported Non-Minion Spells on Death
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Lavianga's Spirit
explicitMods: Skills Cost no Mana during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "When the Ancestors fill your cup,
It is only good manners to drink your fill."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.

Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds

The Lightning Golem fires a projectile spell, creates orbs of Lightning that zap nearby enemies, and casts a temporary aura that grants added Lightning Damage to spells and attacks used by the Golem and its nearby allies.
explicitMods: Golems grant 9% increased Attack and Cast Speed

Whether you burn out or explode is up to you.

items.name: Le Heup of All
flavourText: Existence is infinite
A weave of the living and dead
Beyond the understanding
Of the many mortal threads

items.name: Anathema
explicitMods: 14% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Cast a Curse Spell
Your Curse Limit is equal to your maximum Power Charges
flavourText: Enraged by the incompetence of mortals
The demon-lord opens a gateway
Unleashing a litany of pain upon the world.
